meanings.sent1: The anticultural movement rejected traditional art forms.
meanings.sent2: Her anticultural behavior shocked her family.
meanings.sent3: The anticultural party threw a paint party in the museum.
meanings.sent4: His wardrobe was an anticultural explosion of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The anticultural protest was loud and colorful, demanding change.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to or in opposition to cultural norms or values.
meanings.sent1: Their anticultural beliefs challenged societal expectations.
meanings.sent2: The anticultural music festival celebrated diversity.
meanings.sent3: The anticultural fashion show featured unconventional designs.
meanings.sent4: Her anticultural approach to cooking blended flavors in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The anticultural movement embraced individuality and creativity.
